2011-07-23

Iâ€™ve just written this:

for n in `seq 
expr $i - 1
`; do # word name list
        eval echo "\"\t\t\"\$fn_word$n\",\"" >> fn.c
done
And then I woke up.
You can exit(1) any time you like, but you can never leave...
